      Petition underArticle 226of the Constitution of India praying that in the
circumstances stated in the affidavit filed therewith, the High Court may be
pleased to may be Issue a writ petition, order or direction more particularly one in
the nature of Writ of Mandamus declaring the action of the respondents in
opening and continuation of Suspect sheet/Rowdy Sheet against the Petitioner
and also regularly calling the petitioner to their Police Station Station, as illegal,
arbitrary, violation of life and personal liberty and contrary toArticles 14, 19and21of the Constitution of India and consequently direct the respondents to close
the Suspect sheet/Rowdy Sheet against the petitioner.
